title: The Bite of Vengeance: The Devil's Gift
description: Connor Wolf takes his first steps into publication with his vampire tale. The Bite of Vengeance: The Devilâ€™s Gift follows Roconn and Maria, royal vampires of Italy, as they face a new foe: religion. More formidable than anything else they have encountered before, it prompts them to plot a merciless act of revenge. New obstacles constantly appear, no one is quite what they seem and, when faced with a choice of love or revenge, Roconn finds himself walking the path he wished never to take.With characters fuelled by grief, revenge and the need to survive, this fantasy horror will appeal to readers that enjoy twists, turns and treachery.
